alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued December 17 at 10:39AM EST until December 19 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 4 feet in the most persistent lake snows across the Tug Hill Plateau. * WHERE...The Eastern Lake Ontario Region. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times with deep snow cover on roads and poor visibility. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4386 7550 4394 7559 4396 7587 4392 7609 4383 7629 4367 7623 4359 7609 4357 7586 4359 7584 4369 7553 TIME Y22M12D17T1500Z-Y22M12D18T1800Z COORD...4374 7561 4384 7569 4385 7586 4375 7609 4361 7606 4354 7601 4349 7590 4346 7564 4349 7554 4364 7551 TIME Y22M12D18T1800Z-Y22M12D19T0600Z COORD...4354 7559 4369 7570 4370 7580 4360 7597 4340 7606 4327 7592 4342 7586 4324 7586 4348 7581 4345 7558 TIME Y22M12D19T0600Z-Y22M12D20T0000Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
